channel.title: Alt abuse?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Alt abuse?" - Making sure I'm not alt abusing...

item.title: Re: Alt abuse?
item.content:encoded: Don't worry about thatâ€¦you can't spar your alt anyway as long as he isn't BC

item.title: Re: Alt abuse?
item.content:encoded: It's on the official BVS forum. Check the General BvS Discussion board there and you should find it near the top.

item.title: Re: Alt abuse?
item.content:encoded: Where can I find McMasters/Frostwing definition of alt abuse?

item.title: Re: Alt abuse?
item.content:encoded: Yes it is alt abuse by the McMasters/Frostwing definition of alt abuse, but it shouldn't matter. Spars from the same IP don't count when you spar them (your count doesn't go up, you get no xp, and you loose no stamina).

item.title: Alt abuse?
item.content:encoded: In my village we are trying to find other people to spar against and I decided to list my alts as sparing partners. Would this be considered alt abuse? And if this isn't, would it be considered alt abuse to have my own alts as sparing partners? I haven't done either yet because I want clarification before doing anything of the sort.
